0810/A0/04/807/001.status_value: The strategy is validated and being used for other guiding policies and plans such as the national policy on universal health care coverage under finalization.
0810/A0/04/807/001.indicator_name: Stratégie nationale de protection sociale élaborée

0810/A0/04/807/001.status_value: UNICEF has supported the national institute of statistics (INSEED) in the analysis using the Multiple Overlapping Deprivation Analysis (MODA) methodology. Thematic reports are being finalised and will be consolidated with analysis made by the Oxford Poverty and Human Development Initiative (OPHI).
0810/A0/04/807/001.indicator_name: # d'études réalisées pour documenter la privation et/ou la vulnérabilité

0810/A0/04/807/001.status_value: Key interventions will be undertaken during year 2015.
0810/A0/04/807/001.indicator_name: # de projets pilotes conçus et mis en oeuvre sur terrain (comme modèles)

0810/A0/04/807/001.status_value: The social budgeting study has been launched in collaboration with the Ministry of Finance and Budget with objective of analysing the budget cycle related to social sectors to be used for advocacy for child-centred budgeting advocacy purpose.
0810/A0/04/807/001.indicator_name: # des rapports produits pour influencer ou orienter l'allocation budgétaire

0810/A0/04/807/002.status_value: Launched in 2013  the national database « TchadInfo » has been updated this year with new administrative data (agriculture  2013 and education  2013). More demographic data and socio-economic were also added  especially from the ¿consumption and informal sector survey¿ (ECOSIT 2012) and the general population census (2009).
0810/A0/04/807/002.indicator_name: Base nationale de Données TchadInfo disponible et fonctionnelle

0810/A0/04/807/002.status_value: No progress. With the ministry of planning  it was agreed during the annual review 2013  the reorientation of the intervention to make it more strategic. Support the elaboration and implementation of regional and communal development plans emerged as the best way. During 2014  three development plans were validated  including for Logone Occidental Region  and communes of Moundou and Benoye.
0810/A0/04/807/002.indicator_name: # d'unités de gestion de programme mis en place et fonctionnelles

0810/A0/04/807/002.status_value: Orientation session on results-based management approach was organized for all people involved in the process of elaborating the development plans. About 500 people took an active part in this participatory exercise that included professionals  officers (Logone Occidental Region's headquarters and Benoye and Moundou Communes) as well as members of civil society operating in entities.
0810/A0/04/807/002.indicator_name: # et catégories des personnes formées en GAR

0810/A0/04/807/002.status_value: UNICEF support has improved management of the programme of cooperation through regular quarterly coordination meeting involving all sectoral coordinators. Recommendations from this meetings helped improving performance of the programme implementation including better reporting and smooth implementation of HACT across implementing partners. This were also very key for the effective and timely completion of the MTR.
0810/A0/04/807/002.indicator_name: Rapports de qualité sur le suivi de la mise en oeuvre du Programme

0810/A0/04/807/002.status_value: In line with UNICEF response to malnutrition  two nutrition surveys have been conducted during the year covering all 10 affected regions and N'djamena. Findings are used to improve programme performance.
0810/A0/04/807/002.indicator_name: Données désagrégées sur les indicateurs du CRING et du CCC sont collectées/compilées pour le Tchad

0810/A0/04/807/002.status_value: Out of the seven IMEP planned activities  only two have been completed (29%) while 3 are underway (43%).

0810/A0/04/806/001.status_value: 5 special advocacy events have been organized with the effective participation of children in 2014 (DAC  JMLMS  CRC@25  DjamVi Festival  WorldAidsDay). The country office has also strengthened its Youth-led advocacy programs  by officially appointing Youth Advocates  participating to global initiatives like OneMinutesJr Video and EyeSee Photo workshops  strengthening children parliamentarians' capacity on advocacy and CRC promotion  producing dedicated youth magazines  music albums on CRC promot

In close collaboration with UNICEF DOC  and with the direct support of the UNICEF HQ Digital Communication Section and the South Africa Services Unit  the CO produced a series of high-end quality video materials with the aim of documenting 4 thematic areas linked to the Emergency responses  the partnership with GPE and Qatar  Ending Child Marriage program and PMTCT program in Chad.

0810/A0/04/806/002.indicator_name: % des ménages qui font vacciner leurs enfants contre la Méningite A

0810/A0/04/806/002.status_value: Exclusive breastfeeding featured prominently among the key family practices that were promoted during the year 2013. Women's groups involved in sensitization on exclusive breastfeeding were strengthened and trained on interpersonal communication techniques. However the level is still around 3%  according to the SMART survey.
